## Tuple type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export type Tuple<T = unknown, R = T> =
  | [T, ...R[]]
  | [...R[], T]
  | readonly [T, ...R[]]
  | readonly [...R[], T]
```

## Example


```ts
// Expect: [1, ...number[]] | [...number[], 1] | readonly [1, ...number[]] | readonly [...number[], 1]
type Foo = Tuple<1, number>
```
